name: OpenOptions

properties.description: Choose to update all text objects for documents saved with legacy texts (pre-Illustrator 11)
properties.name: updateLegacyText

properties.description: Choose to preserve the spot colors in the gradient mesh objects for legacy documents (pre-Illustrator CS3)
properties.name: updateLegacyGradientMesh

properties.description: Preserve Legacy Artboard (pre-Illustrator CS4) when opening in CS4 or later.
properties.name: preserveLegacyArtboard

properties.description: Convert crop area to Artboard when opening legacy document (pre-Illustrator CS4) in CS4 or later. If false then crop areas are discarded.
properties.name: convertCropAreaToArtboard

properties.description: Create Artboard with dimentions of artwork bounding box when opening legacy document (pre-Illustrator CS4) in CS4 or later.
properties.name: createArtboardWithArtworkBoundingBox

properties.description: Convert print tiles to Artboard when opening legacy document (pre-Illustrator CS4) in CS4 or later.
properties.name: convertTilesToArtboard

description: Options which may be supplied when opening a file.
